name: Religion
description: Your Intelligence (Religion) check measures your ability to recall lore about deities, rites and prayers, religious hierarchies, holy symbols, and the practices of secret cults. This represents academic knowledge of religious traditions rather than personal faith.
typicalUses: Recall lore about a deity or divine being
Identify a holy symbol or religious artifact
Know the rites and practices of a religious order
Recognize the influence of a divine or fiendish power
Understand the tenets and beliefs of a cult or sect
